{"id":1451953686,"question_id":3627,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1731528652,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"17 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1451953686/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Minimum Time to Reach Last Room I","memory":"28.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minTimeToReach(vector<vector<int>>& moveTime) {\n        int rows = moveTime.size();\n        int cols = moveTime[0].size();\n        priority_queue< tuple<int,int,int>, vector<tuple<int,int,int>>, greater<tuple<int,int,int>> > pq; //min\n        vector<vector<int>> time(rows, vector<int>(cols, INT_MAX));\n        pq.push({0, 0, 0}); //time, x, y\n        time[0][0] = 0;\n\n        vector<pair<int,int>> dirs = {{1, 0}, {-1, 0}, {0, 1}, {0, -1}};\n        while(!pq.empty()) {\n            auto [curTime, x, y] = pq.top();\n            pq.pop();\n            if(x == rows-1 && y == cols-1)\n                return curTime;\n            for(auto [dx, dy]: dirs) {\n                int newX = x + dx;\n                int newY = y + dy;\n                if(newX>=0 && newX<rows && newY>=0 && newY < cols) {\n                    int waitTime = max(moveTime[newX][newY]-curTime, 0);\n                    int newTime = curTime + 1 + waitTime;\n                    if(newTime < time[newX][newY]) {\n                        time[newX][newY] = newTime;\n                        pq.push({newTime, newX, newY});\n                    };\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return -1; //unreachable.\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-minimum-time-to-reach-last-room-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
